alert.note: Alert for Adair; Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 3:24PM CDT until May 05 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Benton County in northwestern Arkansas... Eastern Delaware County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Adair County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 324 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles west of Colcord, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Jay... Gravette... Decatur... West Siloam Springs... Colcord... Kansas... Oaks... Maysville... Leach... Twin Oaks... Lake Eucha State Park... Cherokee City... Natural Falls State Park... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
